org.fhaes.fhfilereader

Class FHSeries

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fhaes.fhfilereader.FHSeries
  • Direct Known Subclasses:

    public class FHSeries
extends java.lang.Object
    FHSeries Class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FHSeries(java.lang.String title, int firstYear, boolean hasPith, boolean hasBark, boolean[] recordingYears, boolean[] eventYears, boolean[] injuryYears)
      This class is a container for data about a single series within a fire history data file.

                boolean[] injuryYears)
         throws java.lang.Exception
        This class is a container for data about a single series within a fire history data file.

        Adds a new category entry to the category list for this series.

        public java.util.ArrayList<FHCategoryEntry> getCategoryEntries()
        Get the list of category entries.
        Returns:
        categoryEntries

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Get the title/label for this series.
        Returns:
        title

      • getFirstYear

        public int getFirstYear()
        Get the year for the first year in this series e.g. the year of the first ring of the sample - the pith if present.
        Returns:
        firstYear

      • getLastYear

        public int getLastYear()
        Get the year for the last year for this series e.g. the year of the last ring of the sample - the bark if present.
        Returns:
        the last year for this series

      • getLength

        public int getLength()
        Get the number of years that this series covers.
        Returns:
        the number of years this series covers

      • getRecordingYears

        public boolean[] getRecordingYears()
        Get a boolean[] with a size the same as the number of years this series covers. The boolean values will be false if the tree was not in 'recording status' for the year, or true if it was.
        Returns:
        recordingYears

      • getEventYears

        public boolean[] getEventYears()
        Get a boolean[] with a size the same as the number of years this series covers. The boolean values will be false if the tree did not record a fire event in the year, and true if it did.
        Returns:
        eventYears

      • getInjuryYears

        public boolean[] getInjuryYears()
        Get a boolean[] with a size the same as the number of years this series covers. The boolean values will be false if the tree did not record an injury event in the year, and true if it did.
        Returns:
        injuryYears

      • hasPith

        public boolean hasPith()
        Returns a boolean indicating whether the sample had pith or not.
        Returns:
        pith

      • hasBark

        public boolean hasBark()
        Returns a boolean indicating whether the sample had bark or not.
        Returns:
        bark
